references.paper_title: MambaAD: Exploring State Space Models for Multi-class Unsupervised Anomaly Detection
references.reason: This is the main subject of the paper, introducing a novel approach to multi-class unsupervised anomaly detection using Mamba models.

references.paper_title: Mvtec AD-A comprehensive real-world dataset for unsupervised anomaly detection
references.reason: This paper introduced a benchmark dataset (MVTec AD) crucial for evaluating anomaly detection methods, heavily used in this paper's experiments.

references.paper_title: Efficiently modeling long sequences with structured state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduced the foundational State Space Model (SSM) architecture (S4) that underpins the Mamba model used in this work.

references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduced the Mamba model, a more efficient variant of SSMs, which is the core innovation adopted in the presented approach.

references.paper_title: Anomaly detection via reverse distillation from one-class embedding
references.reason: This paper (RD4AD) proposed a state-of-the-art single-class anomaly detection method, which serves as a key comparative baseline in this work.
